entry.title: WazirX Moves To Recover $150 Million In Shiba Inu, Ethereum And Others With Bounty Program
entry.summary:
Following a hack attack that resulted in the theft of millions of dollars worth of Shiba Inu (SHIB), Ethereum (ETH) and other coins, WazirX has launched an official bounty program. The prominent Indian exchange has promised to reward anyone who assists in recovering the stolen assets.¬†¬†
WazirX Announces Bounty Program To Recover Assets
WazirX has announced via its official X (formerly Twitter) account that it has launched a bounty program in response to the recent cyberattack on one of its Multisig wallets. The team behind the Indian exchange revealed that the bounty program will be focused on recovering the stolen assets from malicious actors.¬†
On July 18, WazirX was hacked by malicious actors who stole $234.9 million worth of ETH, PEPE, USDT and other cryptocurrencies from the ex‚Ä¶

entry.title: BREAKING: Spot Ethereum ETFs Get SEC Nod, Debut Set For Tomorrow
entry.summary:
Spot Ethereum ETFs (exchange-traded fujnds) are ready to hit the market, marking a significant milestone for the cryptocurrency industry following approval by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) on Monday.¬†
Spot Ethereum ETFs Set To Launch On Tuesday
Bloomberg ETF expert Eric Balchunas provided further details following the news, stating that 424(b) forms are now rolling in, signaling the final step to begin trading on Tuesday after a year of anticipation for these new index funds that invest directly in the price of ETH. Blachunas said:
It‚Äôs official: Spot Eth ETFs have been made effective by the SEC. The 424(b) forms are rolling in now, the last step = all systems go for tomorrow‚Äôs 930am launch. Game on. The web pages live as well. Let the marketing wars commence!

entry.title: 93% Of All Bitcoin Addresses Are Profitable As Miners Aggressively Accumulate
entry.summary:
Bitcoin is firm when writing, floating higher and above $60,000. Even as the uptrend appeared labored and momentum waning, there are signs that all is well, at least from the profitability angle.
93% Of Bitcoin Addresses Are In The Money
As of July 22, Bitcoin is stable and down roughly 8% from all-time highs of around $74,000. IntoTheBlock data showed that 93% of all addresses are in the green at spot rates.
If anything, it is a major recovery and a turnaround, especially after the major sell-off of June and early July 2024, when prices plunged to as low as $53,500 before bouncing off.
¬†
At the current valuation, a minority of BTC holders are in the red. These entities most likely bought at around $72,000 or all-time highs, expecting prices to roar to $100,000.

entry.summary:
Mt. Gox, the defunct crypto exchange, has initiated another transaction as part of its ongoing repayment plan to creditors, this time moving a small amount of Bitcoin (BTC) to Bitstamp, another major exchange participating in the distribution of funds to Mt. Gox‚Äôs former users.
Mt. Gox Trustee Continues Bitcoin Distribution

entry.title: Compute Maximalism: The Symbiosis Between Bitcoin Mining and AI
entry.summary: The story of human progress can be simplified into the story of increasing energy utilization. We harness energy to create order, both in terms of biology and society. Energy surpluses allow for every form of wealth creation, which in turn produce new technologies to effectively harness yet more energy. This truth has inspired famous concepts such as the Kardashev scale, which measures civilizations by their ability to harness energy resources towards useful ends. Compute is a natural continuation of this endeavor. Modern digital technology transforms ever greater quantities of electricity into advanced value-creating processes. The most recent surge in demand for compute has come from two technologies in particular: bitcoin mining and, more recently, high performance compute (‚ÄúHPC,‚Äù) in ‚Ä¶

SEC‚Äôs Lawsuit Against Ripple Could Come To An End ‚ÄúVery Soon‚Äù
Garlinghouse mentioned during an interview with Bloomberg that the SEC‚Äôs case against Ripple could end ‚Äúvery soon,‚Äù although he added that they can‚Äôt predict when exactly the judge will give her ruling. Meanwhile, Garlinghous declined to comment when asked if his firm and the SEC were currently in settlement talks.¬†

XRP vs SEC press conference rumoured on 18th. Crypto funds saw $1.44B inflows last week. Rumours China is to ‚Äòunban BTC‚Äô in Q4. S. Korea may delay crypto taxes until 2028. Russia to allow crypto trading on stock exchange. All altcoin categories outperform BTC over 7d. BitConnect infamous promoter convicted. Scroll becomes 8th L2 with TVL over $1bn. ETHFI Season 2 claims available this week. Base hits record 1m UserOps in a week.

entry.title: Zoltan Istvan on AI and Human Immortality
entry.summary: Transhumanist Party founder Zoltan Istvan chats with Decrypt's Emerging Technology report Jason Nelson about his journey with transhumanism, running for office, and why he fears AI is outpacing life science and poses a threat to the quest for immortality.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 157 - ROLLBIT FRIDAY!
entry.summary: The German state sells $2bn+ BTC and has under $300m left. BTC ETF sees $800M of inflows, Mr 100 keeps buying. SOL ETF deadline set for 2025, election could be key. SOL stablecoin TVL soars on Tether & PYUSD growth. Firedancer sees the first accepted block on SOL testnet. ETH ETFs finally expected next week. Monthly active crypto addresses top 100m. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville conference. Golman Sachs to launch 3 tokenization projects. Short squeeze in altcoins sees TIA rise 80% from lows. MOG leads top memes coins, BONK flips WIF. Farming interest shifts to Berachain & Monad.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token
entry.summary:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.
In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he‚Äôs still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn‚Äôt done with the project. Instead, he‚Äôs planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 156 - ETH ON THE RISE!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$147m. ETH outperforms with ETF optimism. Germany government moves 2375 BTC again. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Goldman Sachs to launch 3 tokenisation projects. Realised losses similar to COVID period. Staked ETH nears ATH. CEX stablecoin volume hits 7-month low. CFTC says 70-80% of crypto not securities. Base hardfork improves compression 20-30%. BitMEX pleads guilty to AML violation. APTOS & SEI see weak attendance at ETHcc event.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 155 - ETFs SAVE THE DAY
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: $216m. $654m of inflows into ETFs over 3 days. BTC transaction fees hit 4-year low. German state moves $300m BTC, holdings $1bn. SOL flips ETH for 7d DEX volumes. SOL Firedancer sees first accepted block on testnet. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Crypto monthly active addresses tops 100m. Biden crypto veto now expected to be upheld. Tech coalition urges Biden to back crypto. People face security threats at ETHCC. DBS sees 300% growth in crypto trading. PYUSD now 7th largest stable coin. China may have already sold BTC holdings. Elliptic exposes $11bn USDT scam network. StanChart in talks to buy Howard‚Äôs crypto fund. Polychain accuses former employee of side deals. SEI leads altcoins as it launches v2 mainnet beta. TIA rises 80% from lows on short squeeze. TON to release L2 based on Polygon‚Äôs tech stack.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 154 - THE CELEBS ARE BACK...
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$295m. ETF inflows fight German selling, BTC unchanged. German government sells $900m BTC, moves more. Rate of sales implies German supply sold this week. ETH ETFs set to launch next week. Election may affect SOL ETF decision March 2025. Raydium beats ETH for 24hr fees. BTC ‚Äòpower law‚Äô points to 300% gain by 2025. BTC in 80 day post-halving re-accumulation phase. BlackRock treasury fund hits $500m. Republicans release pro-crypto policy. Senate urges blockchain tests for national security. Drop in BTC mining difficulty ‚Äòcomparable to FTX‚Äô. MetaMask introduces delegation toolkit. 25 major projects to launch tokens in H2 2025.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 153 - A WEAK WEEKEND
entry.summary: BTC sinks 5% then bounces back to unchanged. $58-60k the main area for ‚Äòshorts to defend‚Äô. Crypto funds saw $441m inflows last week. German government transfers 1000 BTC to sell. Crypto sentiment at lowest in over a year. ETH spot premium hits local highs. Japanese firm Metaplanet buys $2.5m BTC. Expect more miners merging: TeraWulf CEO. SOL Firedancer bug bounty goes live. GLM transfers $117m of ETH treasury to exchanges. 98% of coins have topped this cycle: Kang. ETH ETF should come in next 2 weeks: Geraci. Crypto progress disheartening: Copeland.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 152 - JOINED BY DEEZE!
entry.summary: BTC hits $54k, set for worst week in over year. Mt. Gox begins to move BTC & make distributions. German government continues to sell holdings. Worst day for BTC liquidations since FTX. Justin Sun says he is willing to buy German BTC. German MP calls on it to stop selling BTC. $52k super-trend support line eyed for BTC. Funding rates turn extremely negative across majors. Only 6 mining machines profitable below $56k. Coinbase spot buyers emerge to counter drop. Total3 hits RSI lows only hit 4 times in last 4 years. Fear & Greed index hits lowest since Jan 2023. Capo remains bullish. Real selling begins at $38k: Schiff. Coinbase continue to fight for Gensler‚Äôs emails. Circle mints $250m USDC on SOL. Symbiotic hits $1bn TVL. Taiwan Mobile may open crypto exchange. Unisat completes funding round with Binance.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 151 - BTC TAPS THE 60K LINE
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: -$14m. BTC drops to $60k, CME gap filed again. $1bn shorts liquidated if we rally to $62.6k. Pump(.)fun surpasses ETH for revenue. ETH will outperform BTC after ETF launch: K33. ETH ETF may be delayed even further. BTC heading to $150k: Fundstrat. Chainlink & Fidelity partner for fund data on-chain. USDC protects the dollar: Circle ad. Robinhood considers crypto futures in US & EU. Another BTC miner looks to IPO in US. Vitalik bullish on prediction markets. Sentient Labs raises $85m for AI on SOL. Mantra to tokenise $500m of real estate. TAO falls 15% after security breach. Crypto scams & hacks hit $572m in Q2.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 150 - BILLY TO A BILLY?
entry.summary: BTC ETF inflows hit highest in a month. ETH ETF inflows to hit $5bn in 6 months: Gemini. ETH public funds see largest outflow since 2022. SOL hits new ATH for monthly economic value. Sellers starting to look exhausted: Crypto Quant. Silvergate sued by SEC, settles for $63m. Circle gets stablecoin license for USDC in EU. US DoJ ironically chooses Coinbase for custody. Bitcoin miner aims for $16bn IPO. Bitfarms increases BTC mining amid takeover attempt. DOT has 2 year runway amid large burn. DOT ecosystem builders turn against team. PENDLE TVL falls $3bn as restaking rewards end. PayPal stablecoin goes live on Jupiter. At least $600m altcoin unlocks this month.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 149 - LUCA NETZ LIVE!
entry.summary: BTC bounces back above $61k after nosedive. SOL leads majors, BTC dominance falls. BTC RSI hit 18, largest net selling day in over a year. $174m ETF outflow led by GBTC. German government sells $24m more more BTC. Mt Gox info probably ‚Äòleaked to insiders‚Äô. Mr 100 buys dip for first time in 34 days. SOL leads Moonpay transactions for 5th week. Trump may speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Biden rehires crypto advisor. Crypto & AI complement each other: Balaji. Bitcoin will protect AI‚Äôs wealth: Pomp. Tether stops minting on Algorand & EOS. Jupiter launches v3 swaps. ETH Foundation mailing list gets leaked. Jump CEO resigns after CFTC investigation. 54% of Japanese institutional investors want BTC. Strike launches in UK. MiCA approved EUR stablecoins coming in 6 days.

entry.title: Transhumanism and the Quest for Immortality with SingularityNET CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel
entry.summary: Transhumanism is a philosophical and intellectual movement that advocates the enhancement of the human condition using technologies that can increase longevity, cognition, and well-being. In this interview, SingularityNET founder and CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel discusses his background in the transhumanist movement and how AI, and AGI will play a part.

entry.title: Vivendi Web3 Lead: 'There's No Ethical GenAI if You Don't Protect Content'
entry.summary: Fabien Aufrechter, VP of Web 3.0 at Vivendi, joined Rug Radio's Farokh aboard the Joker Odyssey at Cannes Lions to discuss the media group's plans for a global digital copyright, and how token-gated media will lead to the end of third-party cookies.
